dialogue: Shelly Gard--
Just need the first name.
Sorry.
How tall are you?
Age?
A gentleman never asks a lady... her age-- 36?
Sorry-- I lied-- I’m...
Sorry, I’m so nervous! I’ve been in Le Razzle Dazzle for a very long time so this is-- I haven’t auditioned in a while... But it’s exciting!
You have an act prepared?
I do. I’m a dancer.
Music?
I gave it to... The maestro.
Okay.
...Okay.
Okay, thank you.
Wait-- that’s it?
Yeah, we get the idea. Thanks for coming in, Sherry.
Shelly.
You didn’t like it?
It’s not what we’re looking for.
...What are you looking for?
Just a different vibe.
Like what? Like-- I actually have a very versatile background--
I thought you said you’ve been with Le Razzle Dazzle for--
Before that-- Just please just tell me what you’re interested in and I’ll give it to you.
Um--
You’re looking for dancers, I’m a dancer, I’m an experienced dancer!
We’re looking for dance acts that are either... somewhat acrobatic or... sexy.
Okay-- alright-- I can do that-- How about like a Salome dance of the seven veils kind of thing? Is that the kind of thing you’d be interested in?
It’s gonna be a no for today.
Oh come on!! You can just dismiss a person like this! This is how it works??
This is how auditioning works, yes--
Hey, please, I worked really hard--

Look, if you were a really good dancer, it might be different, but your technique isn’t great. You were obviously hired for Le Razzle Dazzle because you were beautiful and young, not because you were a brilliant dancer. I mean, that’s not news, is it? If you had great training, if you had been with a company in New York, maybe you’d have more of an argument here, but you’ve been in that show for how long? They hired you because you were young and sexy. I don’t know how to help you if you don’t understand that’s not what you’re selling anymore.
Thank you for coming in. Next!!
Is this what you’re looking for?? Is this sexy enough for you?? Is this what young and sexy girls do so effortlessly??
NO!! Let go of me!
I don’t want to leave yet!
I’m beautiful. I’m fifty-seven and I’m beautiful, you son of a bitch!
Go do your audition-- you’re missing your audition!
You should have told me a hundred years ago to quit this stupid-- bullshit--!
You saw it happening-- you saw me losing Hannah and you didn’t say anything, you were there--
Yes you did! You saw it! You and Jodie, you want me to be your mother but I have a daughter already-- I have one!
